name: Welcome To My Orbit
description:
Use your laser to shrink other planets and join them into your orbit. Avoid asteroids, and get as many planets in your orbit as you can!

HOW TO PLAY

WSAD to Move

SPACE to stop shooting

SCROLL Wheel to Zoom

Collide with Planets smaller than you to add to orbit

Avoid Asteroids and Bigger Planets

Get the most planets in your Orbit

Shout out to Michael K Taylor for encouraging me to actually do this jam xD https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQmShgdO4Zu2CT1K0Y4J66g

My Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCC9jO_8PiZNkNmGjR0mbBeA

Font: Sector 034

Submitted for GMTK 2021 Jam
